name: EXOmination
description:
EXO have been captured by the Red Force.

10 puzzles on each of 9 levels must be solved to set them free. Can you solve the puzzles and save the day?

  **Answers are not restricted to solely EXO (group) albums but also could be about subunits and solos as well.

For the best gaming experience, it's recommended to play on a PC or Mac, but the game is also available for Android so you can play on-the-go.

Supported languages : English, Français, Español, 한국어, 日本語

  **中文版4月5日发布

Note: on Android for 한국어, 日本語 make sure to check here in the preferences menu

To play, simply download the correct file for the device you will be playing on and run the .exe file or install the apk.

  **You might have to temporarily turn off app scanning in Google Play in order for the Android app to be allowed to be installed as the app is not being downloaded from the Google Play app directly (but don't worry, the app is perfectly safe!)
